title: $C^{1}$-isometric embeddings of Riemmanian spaces in Lorentzian spaces
abstract:
For any compact Riemannian manifold $(V,g)$ and any Lorentzian manifold
$(W,h)$, we prove that any spacelike embedding $f: V \rightarrow W$ that is
long ($g\leq f^{*}h$) can be $C^{0}$-approximated by a $C^{1}$ isometric
embedding $F: (V,g) \rightarrow (W,h)$.
